title: Opengrep Launches as Free Fork After Semgrep License Shift
author: B Cameron Gain
description: Opengrep was created with a governance structure to sustain continued and indefinite open source freedom of use that Semgrep no longer offers.
cntitle: Opengrep 在 Semgrep 许可证变更后作为免费 Fork 发布
cndescription: Opengrep 的创建采用了一种治理结构，旨在维持持续且无限期的开源使用自由，而 Semgrep 已不再提供这种自由。
